title: First evidence bacterial-induced apoptosis in algae

title_detail.value: First evidence bacterial-induced apoptosis in algae

summary: Biologists show the first evidence of apoptosis, or programmed cell death in algae. The outcomes have broad-reaching implications, from the development of targeted antibiotics to the production of biofuels in industry.

summary_detail.value: Biologists show the first evidence of apoptosis, or programmed cell death in algae. The outcomes have broad-reaching implications, from the development of targeted antibiotics to the production of biofuels in industry.
